name: Toon City Cross Road
description:
Toon City Crossy Road

Download this game and manage the traffic,Click on the car and decrease the chances of accident,this game is totally about to manage the traffic.3D Models of a car can attract the user most.there is different types of a 3D models of cars,trucks and bus.manage the traffic at the cross roads and earn the points.download this game,be a good citizen and help the city to reduce the accident at cross roads

Key Features

Attractive 3D Car models

Easy Controlling

User Friendly game

High Definition graphics
